products.title: Capri Vision Navy Day and Night Blind
products.description: The capri vision navy day and night roller blind is designed in a classic navy hue and is great for adding the finishing touch to a coordinating scheme. The striped design includes navy polyester fabric panels and sheer voile panels so you can easily alter the natural light levels in your room. Product id: db-vrbx1849 fabric colour: navy material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium tube with steel brackets energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes capri vision navy day and night blind in blue.
